CustomField.formula: IF( Name = "Directors & Officers", "D2", IF( Name = "Excess D&O", "D2", IF( Name = "D&O", "D2", IF( Name = "FMP M&PL", "D4", IF( Name = "Excess EPL", "D6", IF( Name = "EPL", "D6", IF( Name = "FMP EPL", "D6", IF( Name = "Employment Practices Liability Insurance", "D6", IF( Name = "Excess FID", "D2", IF( Name = "FID", "D2", IF( Name = "Fiduciary Liability","D2", IF ( Name = "Key Man", "50% PN / 50% KG", IF ( Name = "FMP FID", "D2","" )))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Lloyd's Risk Code
